code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: 4.6 x 5.1 x 4.6 cm mass in the aortopulmonary window encasing the left pulmonary artery, a 1.9-cm subcarinal lymph node, and a mass in the left upper lobe of the lung measuring 2.5 x 2.1 cm with suspicious regional lymphangitic spread
shows 2 enhancing cerebral metastases of lung cancer in the left cerebral hemisphere
